app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Sharpen Me
app_description: Simple Elegant and Powerful With Sharpen Me the fastest most efficient image sharpening app in App Store Image sharpening becomes easier than ever!! All you need to do is just selecting a photo from albums or taking one with built in camera instantly and our app will handle the left for you. Need more control No problem! By scrolling the slider you can tweak the sharpening depth until you get the best version. If you re satisfied with the optimized result just press Save ! A copy will be save into your album and you can easily share it with your friends.
